channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 21:24 Air alarm in Pologivskyi district. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 21:24 Air alarm in Pologivskyi district. Stay tuned for further messages. #Пологивский_район This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
